title: Where is Cassiopeia's tail update?
body: Thought it was in the patch

replies.body: Hi! It's something currently on the PBE, but we have a few issues to still sort out with it, which is why it wasn't shipped with 7.3.
Uhm...patch 7.4 is here, in the patch notes it states that the change has been implemented but guess what, the tail is still as before, stiff. Whats up?{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
This was an error in the patch notes - it wasn't intended to be pushed to live in 7.4.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FYEEQE7R,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2017-02-27T18:28:20.629+0000)
>
> This was an error in the patch notes - it wasn't intended to be pushed to live in 7.4.

Will you guys ever fix her death animation? She's been reverting to her pre-2014 texture update in all skins but Jade Fang for going on 3 years now.
Good question.~ I can bring this up to the team and hopefully get this put in our backlog of things to fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FYEEQE7R,comment-id=00020001000000010000,timestamp=2017-03-01T18:01:46.064+0000)
>
> Good question.~ I can bring this up to the team and hopefully get this put in our backlog of things to fix.

Awesome!
I don't believe there's a patch expected for this at the moment, at least, last I've heard.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FYEEQE7R,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-09T20:08:09.362+0000)
>
> Hi! It's something currently on the PBE, but we have a few issues to still sort out with it, which is why it wasn't shipped with 7.3.

Thank you for the update at least its not up in the air and status unknown. Thanks KateyKhaos
No its still not implemented where the fuck is rito doing these things, too focused on call of dooty champions and their blood moon shit

Some things take a little while to fully implement.

And your insults are terrible.

Call of... Dooty?
What are you even talking about?
I'm just gonna assume the dooty was intentional but what skins are call of duty like?
I too am curious. Was it not implemented?
